# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(WellBore_plot)

ADD_PLOT_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(WellBore)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
WellBorePluginInfo.C
WellBoreCommonPluginInfo.C
WellBoreAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
WellBorePluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
WellBoreGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisWellBorePlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisWellBorePlotWindow.h
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
WellBoreViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
WellBoreViewerPluginInfo.C
avtWellBorePlot.C
avtWellBoreFilter.C
avtWellBoreNameMapper.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
WellBoreViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
WellBoreEnginePluginInfo.C
avtWellBorePlot.C
avtWellBoreFilter.C
avtWellBoreNameMapper.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_PLOT_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IWellBorePlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IWellBorePlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IWellBorePlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    QT_WRAP_CPP(GWellBorePlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})
    ADD_LIBRARY(GWellBorePlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GWellBorePlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VWellBorePlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(VWellBorePlot VIEWER)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VWellBorePlot visitcommon viewer )

    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GWellBorePlot VWellBorePlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            WellBoreScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyWellBoreAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SWellBorePlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        IF(WIN32)
            # This prevents python from #defining snprintf as _snprintf
            SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(SWellBorePlot PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS HAVE_SNPRINTF)
        ENDIF()
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SWellBorePlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SWellBorePlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY WellBoreAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/plots)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaWellBore ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} WellBoreAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EWellBorePlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EWellBorePlot_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtplotter_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EWellBorePlot_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EWellBorePlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EWellBorePlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EWellBorePlot_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtplotter_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EWellBorePlot_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EWellBorePlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(plots ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(plots WellBore ${INSTALLTARGETS})
